attributes.action: Free TV Licences For University Students
attributes.additional_details:
As many students go to university have restricted funds, it is unfair for them to be expected to pay for a TV licence. Television can provide a valuable resource for students for research as well as being vital for those studying towards media, broadcasting and journalism degrees.

Therefore TV licences should be free (or offered at a severely reduced rate) to under and post graduates who are studying at university away from home and are not covered by their parent's TV licence.
